TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InvokeCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks When invoking workflows asynchronously using one of the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowInvoker.InvokeAsync%2A> overloads in <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowInvoker>, workflow host authors can handle <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowInvoker.InvokeCompleted> to get data from the completed workflow, or exception data if the workflow failed to complete.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Outputs As IDictionary(Of String, Object)
public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^> ^ Outputs { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^> ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets an of the root activity's output argument values from the completed workflow.
Docs.value: A dictionary of the root activity's output argument values from the completed workflow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The output argument values in the dictionary are keyed by argument name.
